resources.string: The settings button. Click to access application settings.
The Shuffle Button. Tap the Shuffle Button shuffle the current playlist. Tapping again, unshuffles the playlist.

The Rewind Button. Tap the Rewind Button to restart the song at the beginning after the ong has played for at least 3 seconds. Otherwise, seek to the previous track in the playlist. Tap and hold to rewind the song manually.
The Play/Pause button. Tap the Play/Pause button song to play/pause the song respectively.
The Fast-Forward Button. Tap the Fast-Forward Button to seek to the next track. Tap and hold to fast-forward through the song.

The Repeat Button. There are 3 modes: Playthrough, represented by a straight line and plays the entire current playlist once, and then pauses, Repeat Current Playlist, represented by curved arrows pointing at each other and plays the current playlist in a loop, and Repeat One, represented by the Repeat Icon but includes a 1 on the inside and plays the current song in a loop.
